column4: have an interesting question. I'm trying to upgrade pulseaudio in ubuntu 9.10. the commands i've read to use are here: http://pastebin.com/m77c6352e
will the apt-get dist-upgrade push me to 10.04 alpha?
or just update the pulse audio?
it will upgrade all packages you have installed to the latest versions in your repositories (no, it won't upgrade to 10.04)
